0D2B7D9E.Line39.BAE4: Lilith plans to teach your mother a ritual. One that needs blood. Your mother seemed...receptive.

158C270A.Line37.6DE47: What did you see this time? I don’t need sparing. Tell me.

2C4C8336.Line27.B6582: I...I trained her well. She’s a good kid. Strong. She’ll be alright, she...

7EB30ECB.Line35.BD31C: Good. You're ready for lesson one. Blood is the key.

912480F8.Line5.BD31C: You’ve mastered your fear, but I still sense your pain. You miss your daughter.

C65A2CEE.Line29.BD31C: To reach Rathma, we will need to cross a lake at the bottom of these ruins. It requires a ritual. I will teach you.

F716D740.Line3.B6582: My magpie. She's scared right now, she must be.

F87CC068.Line23.BD31C: Go, or stay. It is time to choose.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: Underworld - Red Ghost Lilith and Vhenard Chat 3
